#summary Language sintax

= Sintax =

===Imports and include file:===
{{{
     // Import
     $java.lang
     // Include file
     $"script.cj"
}}}

===Variables===
{{{
     // Defining a new variable
     x = 0
     x = "Programing 'Java' with CajuScript!"
     x = 'Programing "Java" with CajuScript!'
     x = "Programing \"Java\" with CajuScript!"
     x = 'Programing \'Java\' with CajuScript!'
     x = StringBuffer(x)
     x.append(" "+ x)
     System.out.println(x.toString())
}}}

===IFs===
{{{
     // IF
     x = 10
     x < 10 & x > 0 ?
         System.out.println("X is less than 10!")
     ? x > 10 & x ! 10 ?
         System.out.println("X is greater than 10!")
     ? x = 10 ?
         System.out.println("X is 10!")
     ??
         System.out.println("X is less than 1!")
     ?
}}}

===LOOPs===
{{{
     // LOOP
     x = 0
     x < 10 & x >= 0 @
        System.out.println(x)
        x += 1
     @
}}}

===FUNCTIONs===
{{{
     // FUNCTION
     // Allowed:
     // addWithX v1, v2 # ... #
     // addWithX(v1 v2) # ... #
     x = 5
     addWithX(v1, v2) #
         // "~" is the return
         ~ x + v1 + v2
     #
     x = addWithX(10, 20)
     System.out.println("X = "+ x)
}}}

===Null value:===
{{{
     // $ is the null value
     x = $
}}}     

===Arithmetic Operators:===
{{{
     // + Addition
     x = 0 + 1
     x += 1
     
     // - Subtraction
     x = 0 - 1
     x -= 1
     
     // * Multiplication
     x = 0 * 1
     x *= 1
     
     // / Division
     x = 0 / 1
     x /= 1
     
     // % Modulus
     x = 0 % 1
     x %= 1
}}}

===Comparison Operators:===
{{{
     // = Equal to
     (x = y)
     
     // ! Not equal to
     (x ! y)
     
     // < Less Than
     (x < y)
     
     // > Greater Than
     (x > y)
     
     // < Less Than or Equal To
     (x <= y)
     
     // > Greater Than or Equal To
     (x >= y)
}}}

===Comments allowed:===
{{{
     -- Comment...

     // Comment...

     \ Comment...
}}}
